RelatedSentence: Russian Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Rogozin said last Tuesday Russia intends to suspend the work of 11 ground - based facilities of the US Global Positioning System ( GPS ) throughout its territory starting from June 1 and shut them down beginning September 1 .
